extractor.prompt:
You are a signal extractor. Your job is to identify concrete, verifiable claims from the input.
Do NOT interpret or analyze. Just extract.

INPUTS:
SOURCE: Mozilla Says It’s Finally Done With Two-Faced Onerep
URL: https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/11/mozilla-says-its-finally-done-with-two-faced-onerep/
CONTENT: In March 2024, Mozilla said it was winding down its collaboration with Onerep -- an identity protection service offered with the Firefox web browser that promises to remove users from hun...
extractor.raw_response:
CLAIM: Mozilla is still promoting Onerep despite winding down collaboration in March 2024 | SOURCE: https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/11/mozilla-says-its-finally-done-with-two-faced-onerep/ | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: Superbox media streaming devices require intrusive software that forces user networks to relay traffic for cybercrime activities | SOURCE: https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/11/is-your-android-tv-streaming-box-part-of-a-botnet/ | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: Rey, the admin of "Scattered LAPSUS$ Hunters," confirmed his real identity and agreed to an interview | SOURCE: https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/11/meet-rey-the-admin-of-scattered-lapsus-hunters/ | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: Phishing groups are promoting kits to create fake e-commerce sites for stealing payment card data | SOURCE: https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/12/sms-phishers-pivot-to-points-taxes-fake-retailers/ | CONFIDENCE: high  
CLAIM: A $25M academic cheating network is linked to a Kremlin-connected oligarch’s Russian university | SOURCE: https://krebsonsecurity.com/2025/12/drones-to-diplomas-how-russias-largest-private-university-is-linked-to-a-25m-essay-mill/ | CONFIDENCE: high  

SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 9  
SIGNAL: Tech | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 8  
SIGNAL: Policy | DIRECTION: down | MAGNITUDE: 7

- Time-bound (specific resolution date)
- Falsifiable (clear criteria)
